FuncDef: This command debugs the Diameter node. Node-level debugging can report on all message exchange between the peers. Although this level can report messages that contain session id (app level messages), this level is session unaware. It deals strictly with getting the messages in and out of the system (connection level messages which are not routable, and application level messages which are routable).

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the host name, up to 80 characters.
